Reinstatement of Eligibility for MOHP for a Surviving Spouse
Effective January 5, 2021,
PL 116-315
made it possible for a surviving spouse to
qualify for the MOHP benefit, and
regain eligibility after termination of remarriage as described below.
Therefore, on or after January 5, 2021, eligibility is established in any case in which the remarriage of the surviving spouse is terminated by
death
divorce, or
annulment

:Â  For more information on eligibility for benefits after remarriage under
PL 116-315
, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 2.E.1.j
.
